github.com.title: Complete Formatting Test - Bold and Italic
github.com.content: This note tests **bold formatting** and *italic formatting* together. Here's **bold with *nested italic* inside**. And here's *italic with **nested bold** inside*. Multiple **bold** words and *italic* words in the same sentence.

github.com.title: Underline and Strikethrough Test
github.com.content: Testing __underline formatting__ which should convert properly. Testing ~~strikethrough formatting~~ which should work in all formats. Combined: __underlined text with ~~strikethrough~~ inside__. And ~~strikethrough with __underline__ inside~~.

github.com.title: Color Formatting Test
github.com.content: Testing various colors: {color:#ff0000}red text{/color} and {color:#00ff00}green text{/color} and {color:#0000ff}blue text{/color}. RGB colors: {color:rgb(255,165,0)}orange text{/color}. RGBA colors: {color:rgba(128,0,128,0.8)}purple text{/color}. Hex short: {color:#f0f}magenta text{/color}.

github.com.title: Citation and Quote Test
github.com.content: Regular text before citation. {citation}This is an important quote that should be formatted as a blockquote in exports{/citation}. More regular text. {citation}Another citation with **bold** and *italic* inside{/citation}. Final regular text.

github.com.title: Link Formatting Test
github.com.content: Testing various links: [Google](https://www.google.com) and [GitHub](https://github.com) and [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com). Links with formatting: [**Bold Link**](https://example.com) and [*Italic Link*](https://test.com). Link in other formatting: **Bold text with [embedded link](https://link.com) inside**.

stackoverflow.com.title: Complex Mixed Formatting Test
stackoverflow.com.content: This is a **complex test** with *multiple* __formatting__ ~~types~~ {color:#ff6600}combined{/color} together. {citation}As the documentation states: **bold**, *italic*, __underline__, ~~strikethrough~~, and {color:#0066cc}colored{/color} text should all work{/citation}. Here's a [link to the solution](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/test) with **bold link text**.

stackoverflow.com.title: Edge Cases and Special Characters
stackoverflow.com.content: Testing edge cases: **bold with ** asterisks** and *italic with * asterisks*. Underline with __double __ underscores__. Colors with special chars: {color:#ff0000}text with "quotes" and 'apostrophes'{/color}. Citation with special chars: {citation}Quote with <brackets> and &ersands;{/citation}.

developer.mozilla.org.title: Nested Formatting Combinations
developer.mozilla.org.content: Testing nested combinations: **Bold with *italic* and __underline__ and ~~strikethrough~~ inside**. {color:#ff0000}Red text with **bold** and *italic* and __underline__ inside{/color}. {citation}Citation with **bold** and *italic* and {color:#0000ff}blue text{/color} inside{/citation}.

developer.mozilla.org.title: Multi-line and Paragraph Test
developer.mozilla.org.content:
First paragraph with **bold** text.

Second paragraph with *italic* text and __underline__.

Third paragraph with ~~strikethrough~~ and {color:#00ff00}green text{/color}.

{citation}Multi-line citation that spans
multiple lines and should be
formatted correctly{/citation}

Final paragraph with [multiple](https://example1.com) [different](https://example2.com) [links](https://example3.com).

docs.google.com.title: XSS Security Test (Safe Content)
docs.google.com.content: Testing XSS prevention with safe content: {color:#ff0000}safe red color{/color} and {color:rgb(0,255,0)}safe RGB color{/color}. Safe links: [Safe Link](https://www.google.com) and [Another Safe Link](https://github.com). {citation}Safe citation with normal text{/citation}. **Bold** and *italic* and __underline__ should all work safely.

docs.google.com.title: Performance Test with Long Content
docs.google.com.content: This is a **performance test** with *longer content* to ensure __formatting works__ with ~~larger amounts~~ of {color:#ff0000}text content{/color}. {citation}Long citations should also work properly even when they contain a lot of text and multiple formatting elements like **bold** and *italic* and __underline__ and {color:#0000ff}colored text{/color}{/citation}. Multiple links: [Link 1](https://example1.com), [Link 2](https://example2.com), [Link 3](https://example3.com), [Link 4](https://example4.com). More **bold** and *italic* and __underline__ and ~~strikethrough~~ formatting throughout the content to test performance with **multiple** *formatting* __elements__ ~~scattered~~ {color:#00ff00}throughout{/color} the text.
